src:
Bupati Purbalingga 'Launching' Sendra Tari Babad Tanalum
06 Nov 2019, 20:02 by SUPRIANTO Spj


Bupati Purbalingga 'Launching' Sendra Tari Babad Tanalum

KBRN, Purbalingga:  Bupati Purbalingga Dyah Hayuning Pratiwi me-launching sendra tari Babad Tanalum sekaligus pembukaan Pesta Budaya Desa Tanalum Kecamatan Rembang, Rabu (6/11/2019) siang. Pembukaan ditandai pemukulan gong oleh bupati, didampingi forkompincam Rembang di lapangan dukuh Pucung Rumbak Desa Tanalum. Sendra tari Babad Tanalum berdurasi 15 menit dimainkan oleh 20 penari nampak apik dan tidak membosankan.Bupati Tiwi sangat mengapresiasi kreatifitas warga setempat dengan membuat sendra tari Babad Tanalum dan Pesta Budaya. Baik koreografer maupun musik penggiring diciptakan oleh warga setempat. Dan berharap Tanalum mampu menjadi juara desa Wisata di tingkat nasional. “Dengan di-launchingnya sendra tari Babad Tanalum mampu menumbuhkan kecintaan warga masyarakat desa Tanalum terhadap seni budaya lokal yang ada di Kabupaten Purbalingga, khususnya yang ada di desa Tanalum. Saya juga mengapresiasi karena di tahun 2019 ini desa Tanalum menjadi salah satu nominasi Lomba Desa Wisata Nusantara. Dan saya berharap desa Tanalum bisa menjadi juara sehingga mampu mengangkat nama Purbalingga dan Jawa Tengah,” kata Tiwi.Pencipta sendra tari Babad Tanalum Oktaviani Suswanti yang lebih akrab dipanggil Icus menjelaskan, sendra tari ini menggambarkan terbentuknya Desa Tanalum yang semula hutan lebat.Gambaran hutan ini dipentaskan dalam bentuk penari yang membawa sejumlah gunungan. Sendra tari garapan koreo Icus dan musik oleh ki dalang Mitro dipamerkan sekaligus dilaunching pada acara Gelar Budaya Tanalum. “Awalnya merupakan hutan belantara yang saya gambarkan lewat gunung-gunungan, kemudian datanglah pengembara bernama Pangeran Kuncung yang datang di wilayah Pucung Rumbak. Sang pengembara ini datang untuk babat alas, kemudian disusul orang lain yang mulai berdatangan dengan mengolah lahan sebagai mata pencaharian yang digambarkan melalui tari petani.,”jelas Icus.Kades Tanalum Ujang Jatmiko saat memberikan sambutan, minta kepada bupati untuk memperhatikan akses jalan dari desa Sumampir menuju desa Tanalum. Meski desa Tanalum terkenal dengan desa seribu curug dan banyak dikunjungi wisatawan, namun jalan menuju desa setempat sangat sempit dan rusak. Pihaknya minta agar jalan menuju desa Tanalum diperlebar. Terlebih pada tahun ini Tanalum mewakili Provinsi Jawa Tengah menjadi duta pada Lomba Desa Wisata Nusantara.
text:
Regent of Purbalingga 'Launching' Sendra Tari Babad Tanalum
Nov 06 2019, 20:02 by SUPRIANTO Spj


Regent of Purbalingga 'Launching' Sendra Tari Babad Tanalum

KBRN, Purbalingga: Purbalingga Regent Dyah Hayuning Pratiwi launches the Babad Tanalum dance festival as well as the opening of the Cultural Festival of the Tanalum Village in Rembang District, Wednesday (11/06/2019) afternoon. The opening was marked by the regent's beating of the gong, accompanied by the Rembang forkompincam in the Pucung Rumbak hamlet of Tanalum Village. The 15-minute Chronicle Tanalum dance performed by 20 dancers seemed neat and not boring. The Tiwi Regent greatly appreciated the creativity of the local residents by making the Chronicle of the Tanalum dance and the Cultural Festival. Both choreographers and escort music were created by local residents. And hope Tanalum is able to become the champion of the Tourism village at the national level. "With the launch of the Babad Tanalum dance sendra, it is able to foster a love of the people of the Tanalum village community for the local cultural arts in Purbalingga Regency, especially those in the Tanalum village. I also appreciate that in 2019 Tanalum village was one of the nominations for the Nusantara Tourism Village Competition. And I hope that Tanalum village can become a champion so that it can raise the name of Purbalingga and Central Java, "Tiwi said. The creator of the Babad Tanalum dance Oktaviani Suswanti, who is more familiarly called Icus, explained that this dance sentiment illustrates the formation of Tanalum Village which was originally a dense forest. performed in the form of dancers carrying a number of mountains. Chorus dance made by Icus and music by puppeteer Mitro were exhibited and launched at the Tanalum Culture Degree event. "At first it was a wilderness that I described through mountains, then a traveler named Prince Kuncung came in the Pucung Rumbak area. The wanderer came for tripe pedestal, then followed by others who began to arrive by cultivating land as a livelihood described through farmers' dance, "explained Icus. Head of Tanalum Ujang Jatmiko when giving a speech, asked the regent to pay attention to road access from Sumampir village towards the village of Tanalum. Although the village of Tanalum is famous for its thousand curug villages and is visited by many tourists, the road to the local village is very narrow and damaged. He asked that the road to Tanalum village be widened. Especially this year Tanalum representing Central Java Province became an ambassador at the Nusantara Tourism Village Competition.
